description: Indices n of terms of sequence A001142 (product_{k=0 to n}[binomial(n,k)]) that are divisible by all primes <= n.
comments: n+1 is either a prime or a "mutinous number" (A027854).
example: 11 is included because product_{k=0 to 11}[binomial(11,k)] is divisible by 2,3, 5, 7 and 11.
author: _Leroy Quet_, Jul 26 2000
